attributes.action: Exempt charity Bath Tub races from health and safety legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After 35yrs succesfully raising money for local charities, the annual Shoreham-by-sea Bath Tub race has been cancelled due to increasing health and safety legislation and insurance costs.  Last year this event raised £250,000.

The race is entered by adults who are able to judge the risks for themselves and as a result the race should not be subject to the increasingly repressive health and safety legislation that has become a feature of modern-day Britain.
